## Python

### Answer 1

```{python}
import time
from math import ceil, log

def sieve(n: int) -> int:
  n1 = 2
  n2 = 2*ceil(n*log(n))
  p = list(range(2, n2+1))
  for i in range(2, n+1):
    p = [j for j in p if j % p[0] != 0]
  return(p[0])

n = 10001
t0 = time.perf_counter()
print(sieve(n))
t1 = time.perf_counter()
t = t1 - t0
print(f'{t:.3f} sec elapsed')
```
